content: The Act may be cited as the "Arctic Marine Shipping Assessment Implementation Act of 2010". The Arctic Ocean and adjacent seas are becoming more accessible to shipping due to thinning ice cover, technological improvements, and growing demand for Arctic tourism and resources. It is in the interests of the United States to work with Alaska and Arctic neighbors to ensure safe shipping in the region.
